author: Cox Media Group National Content Desk
title: Larry David plays Bernie Sanders on 'SNL'; fans can't curb...
text:
It was bound to happen.
On the latest episode of "Saturday Night Live," "Curb Your Enthusiasm" star Larry David made a cameo as Democratic presidential candidate Sen. Bernie Sanders, much to fans' delight. Twitter erupted with the news, with "Larry David" quickly becoming the top trending topic on the social-media site.
>> PHOTOS: Democratic presidential hopefuls face off in CNN debate
Photos: Democratic presidential hopefuls face off in CNN debate >> RELATED: 5 must-see moments from the Democratic debate
>> RELATED: Bernie Sanders: Americans are 'sick and tired' of hearing about Hillary Clinton's emails
>> Read more trending stories
Alec Baldwin also appeared as former Sen. Jim Webb in the bit, a parody of the Democratic debate.
The episode, hosted by Tracy Morgan, included a "30 Rock" reunion with Baldwin, Tina Fey and Jane Krakowski.
Click here or scroll down to see what people were saying.
